llm_instructions.response_format: Please respond in clear, professional English.
llm_instructions.code_comments: Include comments in English for any code examples.

translations.about_app: This application helps you learn and practice Java code review skills by generating code with intentional errors for you to identify.
translations.app_subtitle: Learn and practice Java code review skills with AI-generated exercises
translations.continue_demo: Continue in Demo Mode (No Login Required)
translations.api_key_required: API key is required for Groq
translations.groq_api_message: Groq API uses cloud-hosted models and requires an API key
translations.advanced_mode_help: Advanced Mode: Select specific error categories to include in the generated code. The system will randomly choose errors from your selected categories.
translations.code_generation_complete: Code generation complete! Proceeding to review tab...
translations.error_selection_prompt: How would you like to select errors?
translations.no_categories: No categories selected. You must select at least one category to generate code.
translations.no_code_snippet_evaluation: No code snippet available for evaluation
translations.no_specific_issues: No specific issue selected. Random errors will be used based on categories.
translations.params_based_on_level: These parameters are automatically set based on your experience level
translations.specific_mode: Specific: Choose exact errors to include
translations.starting_new_session: Starting a new code review session. Please configure and generate a new problem.
translations.workflow_not_initialized: Workflow state not initialized. Please refresh the page.
translations.please_generate_problem_first: Please generate a code problem first
translations.review_process_complete: Review process complete, switching to feedback tab
translations.default_feedback: The system was unable to extract detailed feedback. Please check the overall analysis results.
translations.error_generating_report: There was an error generating a detailed comparison report.
translations.excellent_work_guidance: Excellent work! Try to be even more specific in your explanations of why each issue is problematic.
translations.generated_comparison_report: Generated comparison report for feedback tab
translations.good_performance_guidance: You're doing well! Try looking for issues related to '{missed_text}'. Check for similar patterns elsewhere in the code.
translations.level_upgraded: Your level has been upgraded from
translations.low_performance_guidance: Try a more systematic approach: first check variable declarations, then method signatures, then control flow statements. Look specifically for naming conventions and null handling.
translations.medium_performance_general_guidance: You've found some issues but missed others. Be more methodical - check each line, method signature, and variable declaration carefully.
translations.medium_performance_guidance: Look more carefully for {category} issues. Compare variable types, check method names, and examine control flow statements.
translations.new_session_desc: Start a new code review session to practice with different errors.
translations.no_analysis_results: No analysis results available. Please submit your review in the 'Submit Review' tab first.
translations.no_identified_issues: You didn't identify any issues correctly.
translations.tutorial_available_after_login: Tutorial is available after login, but not required to use the system
translations.java_specific_desc: Issues specific to Java language features
translations.logical_desc: Issues with program logic, calculations, and flow control
translations.standard_violation_desc: Violations of Java conventions and best practices
translations.syntax_desc: Java language syntax and structure errors
translations.clear_logs_warning: This will remove in-memory logs. Log files on disk will be preserved.
translations.displaying_logs: Displaying {count} recent logs. Newest logs appear first.
translations.log_info_markdown:
### Log Information

Log files are stored in the `llm_logs` directory, with subdirectories for each interaction type:

- code_generation
- code_regeneration
- code_evaluation
- review_analysis
- summary_generation

Each log is stored as both a `.json` file (for programmatic use) and a `.txt` file (for easier reading).
translations.no_logs_found: No logs found. Generate code or submit reviews to create log entries.
translations.no_logs_match: No logs match the selected filters.
translations.no_specific_errors_selected: No specific errors selected. Please select at least one error before generating code.
translations.1stPractice: Your First Practice with Code Review in Our System
translations.building_workflow_graph: Building Java Code Review workflow graph
translations.complete_review_first: Please complete all review attempts before accessing feedback.
translations.could_not_determine_error_count: Could not determine error count from state, returning 0
translations.failed_initialize_models: Failed to initialize any models. LLM features will not be available.
translations.learn_code_review_basics: Learn the basics of code review step by step
translations.click_error_types_to_learn: Click on error types below to learn more about them
translations.guided_practice_placeholder: Describe what issues you found in the code...
translations.guided_practice_instructions: Look at the code below and write a review identifying any issues you find
translations.sample_code_explanation: This is a sample Java code with several intentional errors for practice
translations.look_for_syntax_errors: Look for syntax errors and typos
translations.look_for_logic_problems: Look for logical problems in the flow
translations.look_for_null_issues: Look for potential null pointer issues
translations.poor_review_example_text: This code looks fine to me. Maybe fix the spacing.
translations.poor_review_problem_1: Too vague and doesn't identify specific issues
translations.poor_review_problem_2: Focuses on minor formatting instead of serious bugs
translations.poor_review_problem_3: Doesn't explain why issues are problematic
translations.poor_review_lesson: A good review should be specific, identify real issues, and explain their impact
translations.good_review_example_text: I found several critical issues: 1) Line 5 has potential division by zero without checking if b == 0. 2) Line 9 uses == for string comparison instead of .equals(). 3) Line 13 has an off-by-one error in the loop condition.
translations.good_review_strength_1: Identifies specific line numbers and issues
translations.good_review_strength_2: Explains exactly what the problems are
translations.good_review_strength_3: Covers multiple types of errors systematically
translations.good_review_lesson: Effective reviews are detailed, specific, and help developers understand and fix issues
translations.fallback_feedback_good: Good work! You mentioned several key issues in the code.
translations.fallback_feedback_improve: Try to look more carefully for specific issues like null checks, array bounds, and string comparisons.
translations.no_patterns_available: No patterns available for this error type
translations.missing_null_check_pattern_description: Look for code that uses objects without checking if they are null first
translations.array_out_of_bounds_pattern_description: Look for array access that might go beyond the array boundaries
translations.string_comparison_by_ref_pattern_descrip: Look for string comparisons using == instead of .equals()
translations.missing_null_check_explanation: Always check if objects are null before using them to prevent NullPointerException
translations.array_out_of_bounds_explanation: Array indices should be from 0 to length-1. Going beyond causes ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
translations.string_comparison_by_ref_explanation: Use .equals() for string content comparison, not == which compares references
translations.array_out_of_bounds_tip: Use < instead of <= in loop conditions: for(i=0; i<array.length; i++)
translations.string_comparison_by_ref_tip: Use string1.equals(string2) instead of string1 == string2
translations.simulator_description: Step through code execution to understand how errors occur
